article_title: Six Action Tips For When Your Loved One Is Hospitalized

article_metadata.description: When you must become a hospital visitor to a loved one, these six tips can make your time in this foreign environment better. If you understand who is in charge where you loved one is placed, and how to get information about the person's status, it will lessen your own anxiety about the experience. This is from personal experience in visiting my relative who is hospitalized, and how I deal with the institution.
article_metadata.author: Carolyn Rosenblatt
